strings.Value: "Say what you will, but the disease's creator deserves credit for his ingenuity. It's hard to imagine a more frightening death... and a more effective means of enthralling the population."
"I hear a touch of approval in your voice, and I'm not even surprised. How bitterly sad..."
"Far better to direct this seething ingenuity onto some healthy course. Why not invent an unsinkable cart? Or if he cares not for practical tasks... Perhaps invent a new color!"
"Damn it, you are insane. You do realize that, don't you?"
